Name: Drone Fighters
About the game: Arcade style drone fights in VR! Customize your fighter, arm your battle hungry drones with awesome weapons and dominate your opponents in epic cage fights set in futuristic arenas. Drone Fighters is built from the ground up with a VR first mindset. The game’s premise is simple enough: think Highlander, with weaponized drones! Yes, there can only be one top Drone Fighter, and whether you’re clashing with the murderous AI that learns your moves as you go, or take on deadly human opponents in exotic locales, you’ve never, ever played anything that requires this level of hand eye coordination or calm under fire. Cross Platform VR gameplay (Drone control options with Vive and Oculus Touch controllers) 18 solo games to master in different arenas Unique game play with a custom control system optimized for VR Unlock new drones and weapons, customize them as you go Versus fights against your friends and foes from all over the world, with voice chat Build your unique drone fighter avatar with the SurrealVR Customization System Full synchronization with SurrealVR Social App and community Unlimited fun with players from all over the world Learn, master and show off your skills. Practice, practice, practice... It's not easy to become the top Drone Fighter.
